choices: Head north, through the bushes and into a clearing
Go east, to the creek and follow it
Head west, to a rocky area up a hill
Go south, to a more wooded area
Stay put and hope for the best
1.content: Little Eevee slowly awakened from his slumber, the sounds of many different pokemon rang in his ears as they echoed around him. He shook his head and looked up only to see trees and bushes all around. Deep within a forest the Eevee looked around confused and worried, where exactly he was he did not know but one thing was for sure, he was lost and afraid. Eevee stood up onto his feet, anxious about how he would get out of this forest with various directions to choose from. The sunlight seemed brighter just north of him, perhaps that was the edge of the forest, but there would likely be more pokemon that way... To the east was a creek that led down no doubt to a nearby lake, would the lake lead out of the forest? Just west of him, the forest became rocky similar to a mountain, maybe there was a mountain he could scale to get an overlook of the forest. South of the Eevee the forest seemed more dense and less light shined through, it might be longer, but it's less likely for him to run into other pokemon, but why risk any of that? He could simply just stay where he is and hope everything will turn out fine.
1.title: Lost

info.brief_description: An Eevee is lost in a forest and tries to find a way out while avoiding other predators
info.description:
Story:
A small timid-natured feral Eevee finds himself lost in the depths of a vast forest full of various predators that want nothing more than to have that Eevee to themselves, whether he be a snack, a cushion, a slave and who knows what else! Pokemon species from all regions from Kanto to Galar reside within the forest all awaiting for him to stumble by them. Eevee's main tactic is to flee, but he can attempt to fight to hold off predators using his moveset.

Moves:
Iron Tail: Eevee can smack enemies with a hardened tail.
Swift: Eevee fires several star-shaped rays from a distance from his mouth or tail.
Sand-Attack: Eevee kicks dirt in his enemies' faces to blind them for a sneak attack, or a quick getaway.
Last Resort: Eevee's ultimate attack. Using the remainder of his energy, Eevee fires an instantaneous beam of energy at his enemies. Can only be used after Eevee has tried his other three moves.


Rules:
1. Please keep chapters at least one paragraph long and readable.
2. No watersports, scat or inflation.
